attributes.action: Altaaf Hussain Voice of Hatred -MQM UK based Leader
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Sir
I would like to request you to take action against your citizen Altaaf Hussain MQM Leader,who is inciting hatred in Pakistan,from his London based house.

He threatened that the demand of a separate province can quickly turn into a demand of a separate country for Urdu speakers of Sindh.

Politics is fine within the domain of law & legal boundaries. Threatening to breakup of Pakistan is not politics but a crime against country.

UK citizen is asking for breaking Pakistan this Problem should be taken seriously,why your citizen is  interfering in our national matter”.

I am sure you will not allow anyone to use your soil to spread hatred

Regards
Mian Hammad Hassan






http://www.dawn.com/news/1078153/altaf-threatens-separate-province-for-urdu-speaking-sindhis
